root.name: Transcripted
root.description: OverviewIn Transcripted you play as a nano probe, a small device to combat diseases inside the body. During your play you can improve the ship's hull, weapons and artifacts by collecting point for destroying diseases. Prepare to meet specially constructed swarms of enemies especially constructed to defeat you.The game contains 25 levels for solo play and 5 challenge levels where you have to beat a certain score to get the final achievements.PC System RequirementsOS:Windows Vista, 7Processor:1.2 GHz Dual-Core or higherMemory:2+ GB RAMGraphics:128MB graphics card with shader model 2.0DirectX®:9.0cHard Drive:1.5 GB HD spaceSound:DirectX® 9.0c compatible sound cardMac System RequirementsOS:OS X Leopard 10.5.8, Snow Leopard 10.6.3 or laterProcessor:1.2 GHz Dual-Core or higherMemory:4 GB RAMGraphics:256MB graphics card with shader model 2.0Hard Drive:1.5 GB HD space
